newsitem.title: USA: Austin's Int'l names Graybill president.
newsitem.headline: Austin's Int'l names Graybill president.

text.p: Austin's International Inc said it named Larry Graybill as president to replace Elie Sopas, the company's president and chief operating officer, who resigned to pursue other opportunities.
Graybill has been with the company since 1990, serving mainly as chief financial officer, a position he will continue to hold, he told Reuters.
He added that the position of COO "will remain open for now."
Austin's said Sopas will pursue other opportunities in his native South Africa.
